description: Inv@der$ is a dynamic and diverse team of five college students with a shared passion for making a difference. We have come together to tackle challenges and create meaningful solutions in various domains. Each member brings a unique set of skills and expertise to the table, making us a well-rounded and formidable team.

members.name: Arun K Nair
members.description: Creative visionary, excels in frontend and UI design, ensures stunning functionality and aesthetics.

members.name: Arun Krishnadas
members.description: Coordinates, organizes, documents, and keeps the team on track.

members.name: Abhijith Suresh
members.description: Abhijith: Coding whiz, design guru, bridges code and design seamlessly.

members.name: Andrea Sunny
members.description: Andrea excels in communication, creates comprehensive documentation, and adeptly presents.

members.name: Binduja Babu
members.description: Binduja collaborates with Andrea for meticulous, engaging documentation & social media management.

challenge: In the distant future, space tourism will likely be routine for Earth dwellers, but space travelers will need help choosing a destination and determining an itinerary. Imagine you are a travel agent at a future space tourism office. Your challenge is to create a tool that will not only develop customized itineraries for future travelers who want to visit the main bodies in our solar system—perhaps Mars, Jupiter, or Saturn—but also educate present-day users about the many different objects in our solar system.
